SEARCH
Package Pages

Class AdminAccountPage

java.lang.Object
Pages.AdminAccountPage
public class AdminAccountPage extends Object
The AdminAccountPage class provides a user interface for administrative tasks related to managing guest accounts and travel agent accounts. This class contains methods to create the panels for resetting passwords and creating new travel agent accounts, and to update the display of guests who have requested password resets.

Methods in this class are static and provide JPanels that are added to a JTabbedPane in the main application frame. The createAdminTabbedPane method serves as the entry point for generating the tabbed pane with the necessary administrative panels.

This class is a part of the Pages package and works closely with the Guest and TravelAgent classes from the Person package to manage user-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • createAdminTabbedPane

      public static JTabbedPane createAdminTabbedPane(JFrame frame)
      Initializes a JTabbedPane for administrative tasks in the specified JFrame.

      This method adds two tabs to the tabbed pane:

      1. 'Reset Password': Contains a panel created by createResetPasswordPanel method.
      2. 'Create Travel Agent': Incorporates a panel created by createAccountPanel method.
      Parameters:
      frame - The JFrame to which this tabbed pane is added. This frame is used to pass context to the individual panel creation methods.
      Returns:
      A JTabbedPane instance with tabs for 'Reset Password' and 'Create Travel Agent'.

    • createResetPasswordPanel

      public static JPanel createResetPasswordPanel(JFrame frame)
      Constructs a JPanel for resetting guest passwords.

      The panel employs a GridBagLayout to organize its components, which include:

      • A JList displaying guests requesting password resets, fetched from currentAdmin.getResetRequests().
      • A 'Reset Password' button, which triggers a dialog for admin confirmation to reset the guest's password.
      • A 'Logout' button to terminate the admin session and revert to the 'Login' panel.
      Parameters:
      frame - the parent JFrame context for this panel, facilitating panel switching within the application
      Returns:
      the initialized JPanel for password reset functionality

    • createAccountPanel

      public static JPanel createAccountPanel(JFrame frame)
      Constructs a JPanel for creating new travel agent accounts.

      The panel is set with a GridBagLayout and includes several components for inputting new account details:

      1. Text fields for the username, password, name, address, and email of the new travel agent.
      2. A dynamic label that displays password requirements and updates as the password input changes.
      3. A 'Create Account' button for submitting the new account details.

      When the 'Create Account' button is pressed, the entered password is validated against predefined criteria such as minimum length and character requirements. If validation passes, the TravelAgent.createAccount method is invoked to persist the new account. The user is then notified of the success or failure of the account creation.

      Parameters:
      frame - the JFrame that may be used by the button's action listeners to switch views or provide context for dialogs
      Returns:
      a JPanel that facilitates the creation of new travel agent accounts
